faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions about our services

questions.question: What services do you provide?
questions.answer: We offer three main services: Travel services (Hajj, Umrah, and Gulf country trips), Educational consulting for studying in Central Asia from our main office in Kyrgyzstan, and Import/Export services for Egyptian fruits.

questions.question: Where is your main office located?
questions.answer: Our main office is located in Bishkek, the capital of Kyrgyzstan, in Oktyabrsky District, Maxim Gorky Street 21. We also have branches and agents worldwide.

questions.question: How long does visa processing take?
questions.answer: Visa processing time varies depending on the destination and visa type. It usually takes 5-15 business days. We will inform you of the specific timeframe when you submit your application.

questions.question: Do you provide post-travel support?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide ongoing support to our clients. For students, we offer academic follow-up and logistical support. For travelers, we provide emergency assistance and inquiry support.

questions.question: What are your service costs?
questions.answer: Costs vary depending on the service type and required destination. We offer a free initial consultation to determine your needs and provide a detailed, customized quote.

questions.question: How can I contact you in emergencies?
questions.answer: We provide a 24/7 emergency hotline for our traveling clients. You'll receive direct contact numbers when confirming your booking. You can also reach us via email or WhatsApp.
